{"step_by_step_thinking": "Dickkopf-1 (DKK1) is a protein that is involved in the regulation of the Wnt/β-catenin signaling pathway, which is known to play a role in various types of cancers, including prostate cancer. Studies have shown that DKK1 is overexpressed in prostate cancer and may contribute to the progression of the disease. Therefore, there is a role for DKK1 in prostate cancer.", "answer_choice": "A"}
